control.visible: Control.IsVisible(11000) | Control.IsVisible(11001) | Control.IsVisible(11002) | Control.IsVisible(11003) | Control.IsVisible(11004) | Control.IsVisible(12000)

control.content:
DVD Button DVD System.HasMediadvd + !Skin.HasSetting(HideDVD) XBMC.PlayDVD
Applications $LOCALIZE[31004] !Skin.HasSetting(HidePrograms) XBMC.ActivateWindow(1)
Channel Directory $LOCALIZE[31952] Plex.ActivateWindow(1,plex://127.0.0.1/system/plexonline,return) !Skin.HasSetting(HideAppStore) 50FFFFFF
Preferences $LOCALIZE[31955] SetFocus(506)
Search $LOCALIZE[137] Plex.ActivateWindow(10051)
Quit $LOCALIZE[31007] Plex.Quit !Skin.HasSetting(HidePower) + !Skin.HasSetting(ShowSleep) + !Skin.HasSetting(ShowShutDown)
Sleep $LOCALIZE[31960] Plex.Suspend !Skin.HasSetting(HidePower) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowSleep) + !Skin.HasSetting(ShowShutDown)
Shut Down $LOCALIZE[31961] Plex.Powerdown !Skin.HasSetting(HidePower) + !Skin.HasSetting(ShowSleep) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowShutDown)
Music Plug-ins $LOCALIZE[31972] [!Skin.HasSetting(HideMusic)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(5, Root)
Video Plug-ins $LOCALIZE[31971] [!Skin.HasSetting(HideVideos)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(24, Root)
Picture Plug-ins $LOCALIZE[31973] [!Skin.HasSetting(HidePictures)] XBMC.ActivateWindow(2, Root)
KB TEST ActivateWindow(103) -->

control.visible: Control.IsVisible(11000) | Control.IsVisible(11001) | Control.IsVisible(11002) | Control.IsVisible(11003) | Control.IsVisible(11004) | Control.IsVisible(12000)
